name: Fighting & Fantasy RPG
description:
Fighting & Fantasy RPG is a one-page fantasy hack of John Harper's Lasers and Feelings, and inspired by the Fighting Fantasy gamebook series

YOU ARE THE HERO – dicing with death in search of fortune and glory. Welcome to the World of Fighting & Fantasy, where thrilling adventures of sword and sorcery come to life! All you need are some six-sided dice and your imagination.

All the rules needed to play are included on a single page:

  • CHARACTER CREATION: Choose a Community (Dwarf; Elf; Goblin; Halfling; Human; or Orc) and a Role (Archer; Barbarian; Cleric; Rogue; Sorcerer; or Warrior)  
  • SKILLS, STAMINA & LUCK:  Choose your Skills; rules for Stamina and Luck
  • MAGIC & SPELLS: rules on using magic and casting spells
  • STARTING EQUIPMENT: getting ready for the adventure
  • PROFICIENCY CHECKS: simple d6 resolution
  • COMBAT & DAMAGE: rules for Attacking and Defending
  • RUNNING THE GAME: rolling dice and Turn Order
  • QUICK ADVENTURE GENERATOR: tables for generating Quests
  • CHALLENGE TABLE: adversaries, traps and hazards
  • CAMPAIGN PLAY: complete Quests to gain Fortune & Glory!

MAY YOUR STAMINA NEVER FAIL!
